issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A fix has been committed, and will be part of the next release
status.name: Release Pending

fields.description:
During restart of the cloud controller it can be the case that the imaging service is enabled but the compute service is not yet available. When this occurs there are errors handling requests from workers:

{code}
Tue Jun 6 15:04:46 2017 ERROR [EucalyptusClientTask:eucalyptus-bootstrap-servicecontext-common-worker-408] Got error
java.lang.RuntimeException: java.util.NoSuchElementException: Failed to lookup ENABLED service of type Compute.
        at com.eucalyptus.util.Exceptions.toUndeclared(Exceptions.java:259)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.Exceptions.toUndeclared(Exceptions.java:265)
        at com.eucalyptus.resources.client.AbstractClientContext.getClient(AbstractClientContext.java:63)
        at com.eucalyptus.resources.client.Ec2Client$ComputeDescribeInstanceTask.dispatchInternal(Ec2Client.java:93)
        at com.eucalyptus.resources.client.EucalyptusClientTask.dispatch(EucalyptusClientTask.java:55)
        at com.eucalyptus.resources.client.Ec2Client.describeInstances(Ec2Client.java:1217)
        at com.eucalyptus.imaging.backend.ImagingWorkers.verifyWorker(ImagingWorkers.java:187)
        at com.eucalyptus.imaging.backend.ImagingBackendService.GetInstanceImportTask(ImagingBackendService.java:199)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498)
        at org.springframework.expression.spel.support.ReflectiveMethodExecutor.execute(ReflectiveMethodExecutor.java:113)
        at org.springframework.expression.spel.ast.MethodReference.getValueInternal(MethodReference.java:102)
        at org.springframework.expression.spel.ast.MethodReference.access$000(MethodReference.java:49)
        at org.springframework.expression.spel.ast.MethodReference$MethodValueRef.getValue(MethodReference.java:347)
        at org.springframework.expression.spel.ast.CompoundExpression.getValueInternal(CompoundExpression.java:88)
        at org.springframework.expression.spel.ast.SpelNodeImpl.getTypedValue(SpelNodeImpl.java:131)
        at org.springframework.expression.spel.standard.SpelExpression.getValue(SpelExpression.java:330)
        at org.springframework.integration.util.AbstractExpressionEvaluator.evaluateExpression(AbstractExpressionEvaluator.java:169)
        at org.springframework.integration.util.MessagingMethodInvokerHelper.processInternal(MessagingMethodInvokerHelper.java:317)
        at org.springframework.integration.util.MessagingMethodInvokerHelper.process(MessagingMethodInvokerHelper.java:155)
        at org.springframework.integration.handler.MethodInvokingMessageProcessor.processMessage(MethodInvokingMessageProcessor.java:93)
        at org.springframework.integration.handler.ServiceActivatingHandler.handleRequestMessage(ServiceActivatingHandler.java:89)
        at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractReplyProducingMessageHandler.handleMessageInternal(AbstractReplyProducingMessageHandler.java:109)
        at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractMessageHandler.handleMessage(AbstractMessageHandler.java:127)
        at org.springframework.integration.dispatcher.AbstractDispatcher.tryOptimizedDispatch(AbstractDispatcher.java:116)
        at org.springframework.integration.dispatcher.UnicastingDispatcher.doDispatch(UnicastingDispatcher.java:148)
        at org.springframework.integration.dispatcher.UnicastingDispatcher.dispatch(UnicastingDispatcher.java:121)
        at org.springframework.integration.channel.AbstractSubscribableChannel.doSend(AbstractSubscribableChannel.java:77)
        at org.springframework.integration.channel.AbstractMessageChannel.send(AbstractMessageChannel.java:423)
        at org.springframework.integration.channel.AbstractMessageChannel.send(AbstractMessageChannel.java:373)
        at org.springframework.messaging.core.GenericMessagingTemplate.doSend(GenericMessagingTemplate.java:115)
        at org.springframework.messaging.core.GenericMessagingTemplate.doSend(GenericMessagingTemplate.java:45)
        at org.springframework.messaging.core.AbstractMessageSendingTemplate.send(AbstractMessageSendingTemplate.java:105)
        at org.springframework.integration.router.AbstractMessageRouter.handleMessageInternal(AbstractMessageRouter.java:194)
        at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractMessageHandler.handleMessage(AbstractMessageHandler.java:127)
        at org.springframework.integration.dispatcher.AbstractDispatcher.tryOptimizedDispatch(AbstractDispatcher.java:116)
        at org.springframework.integration.dispatcher.UnicastingDispatcher.doDispatch(UnicastingDispatcher.java:148)
        at org.springframework.integration.dispatcher.UnicastingDispatcher.dispatch(UnicastingDispatcher.java:121)
        at org.springframework.integration.channel.AbstractSubscribableChannel.doSend(AbstractSubscribableChannel.java:77)
        at org.springframework.integration.channel.AbstractMessageChannel.send(AbstractMessageChannel.java:423)
        at org.springframework.integration.channel.AbstractMessageChannel.send(AbstractMessageChannel.java:373)
        at org.springframework.messaging.core.GenericMessagingTemplate.doSend(GenericMessagingTemplate.java:115)
        at org.springframework.messaging.core.GenericMessagingTemplate.doSend(GenericMessagingTemplate.java:45)
        at org.springframework.messaging.core.AbstractMessageSendingTemplate.send(AbstractMessageSendingTemplate.java:105)
        at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractMessageProducingHandler.sendOutput(AbstractMessageProducingHandler.java:292)
        at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractMessageProducingHandler.produceOutput(AbstractMessageProducingHandler.java:212)
        at org.springframework.integration.handler.MessageHandlerChain$ReplyForwardingMessageChannel.send(MessageHandlerChain.java:239)
        at org.springframework.messaging.core.GenericMessagingTemplate.doSend(GenericMessagingTemplate.java:115)
        at org.springframework.messaging.core.GenericMessagingTemplate.doSend(GenericMessagingTemplate.java:45)
        at org.springframework.messaging.core.AbstractMessageSendingTemplate.send(AbstractMessageSendingTemplate.java:105)
        at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractMessageProducingHandler.sendOutput(AbstractMessageProducingHandler.java:292)
{code}

We should fail these requests from imaging workers without logging stack traces. Once the compute service is available requests can be handled without failures.
fields.summary: Imaging service should not log stack trace when compute service unavailable

comments.body:
To get into a state when the logging occurs you can:

{code}
# 
# 
# euserv-describe-services --expert --filter service-type=imagingbackend
SERVICE  arn:euca:eucalyptus::imagingbackend:10.111.5.5/  enabled  30  http://10.111.5.5:8773/services/ImagingBackend    
# 
# 
# euserv-modify-service -s STOPPED arn:euca:eucalyptus::imagingbackend:10.111.5.5/
# 
# 
# euserv-describe-services
SERVICE  autoscaling          API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.autoscaling     enabled  
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend   eucalyptus        10.111.5.5                       enabled  
SERVICE  bootstrap            bootstrap         10.111.5.5                       enabled  
SERVICE  cloudformation       API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.cloudformation  enabled  
SERVICE  cloudwatch           API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.cloudwatch      enabled  
SERVICE  cloudwatchbackend    eucalyptus        10.111.5.5                       enabled  
SERVICE  cluster              one               one-cc-0                         enabled  
SERVICE  compute              API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.compute         enabled  
SERVICE  dns                  API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.dns             enabled  
SERVICE  euare                API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.euare           enabled  
SERVICE  eucalyptus           eucalyptus        10.111.5.5                       enabled  
SERVICE  identity             API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.identity        enabled  
SERVICE  imaging              API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.imaging         enabled  
SERVICE  imagingbackend       eucalyptus        10.111.5.5                       stopped  
SERVICE  loadbalancing        API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.loadbalancing   enabled  
SERVICE  notifications        eucalyptus        10.111.5.5                       enabled  
SERVICE  objectstorage        API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.objectstorage   enabled  
SERVICE  pollednotifications  eucalyptus        10.111.5.5                       enabled  
SERVICE  reporting            bootstrap         10.111.5.5                       enabled  
SERVICE  simpleworkflow       API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.simpleworkflow  enabled  
SERVICE  storage              one               one-sc-0                         enabled  
SERVICE  tokens               API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.tokens          enabled  
SERVICE  user-api             API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116                 enabled  
SERVICE  walrusbackend        walrus            walrus-0                         enabled  
# 
# 
# euca-describe-instances verbose
RESERVATION	r-2cb930df	000101004090	euca-internal-imaging-service-SecurityGroup-9KIRQDRCZPEJ2
INSTANCE	i-92aefa78	emi-68a0980f	euca-10-111-30-254.eucalyptus.g-15-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-30-143.eucalyptus.internal	running		0c1.medium	2017-06-14T06:24:38.789Z	one				monitoring-enabled	10.111.30.254	10.111.30.143			instance-store		hvm		6b5df383-e73e-43a1-a212-11bbe29920f0_one_1	sg-96e7c8a2			arn:aws:iam::000101004090:instance-profile/internal/imaging/euca-internal-imaging-service-InstanceProfile-QHS8YQF94WNVR	x86_64
TAG	instance	i-92aefa78	euca:node	10.111.1.72
# 
# 
# euca-terminate-instances i-92aefa78
INSTANCE	i-92aefa78	running	shutting-down
# 
# 
# euca-terminate-instances i-92aefa78
INSTANCE	i-92aefa78	terminated	terminated
# 
# 
# euca-describe-instances verbose
RESERVATION	r-eb183a4d	000101004090	euca-internal-imaging-service-SecurityGroup-9KIRQDRCZPEJ2
INSTANCE	i-a096c32c	emi-68a0980f	euca-10-111-30-15.eucalyptus.g-15-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-30-103.eucalyptus.internal	pending		0c1.medium	2017-06-14T17:20:28.613Z	one				monitoring-enabled	10.111.30.15	10.111.30.103			instance-store		hvm		7f893ce1-0d35-486c-867d-f166d34ff777_one_1	sg-96e7c8a2			arn:aws:iam::000101004090:instance-profile/internal/imaging/euca-internal-imaging-service-InstanceProfile-QHS8YQF94WNVR	x86_64
TAG	instance	i-a096c32c	euca:node	10.111.1.72
# 
# 
# euca-describe-instances verbose
RESERVATION	r-eb183a4d	000101004090	euca-internal-imaging-service-SecurityGroup-9KIRQDRCZPEJ2
INSTANCE	i-a096c32c	emi-68a0980f	euca-10-111-30-15.eucalyptus.g-15-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-30-103.eucalyptus.internal	running		0c1.medium	2017-06-14T17:20:28.613Z	one				monitoring-enabled	10.111.30.15	10.111.30.103			instance-store		hvm		7f893ce1-0d35-486c-867d-f166d34ff777_one_1	sg-96e7c8a2			arn:aws:iam::000101004090:instance-profile/internal/imaging/euca-internal-imaging-service-InstanceProfile-QHS8YQF94WNVR	x86_64
TAG	instance	i-a096c32c	euca:node	10.111.1.72
# 
# 
# euserv-modify-service -s STOPPED API_10.111.5.116.compute
# 
# 
# euserv-describe-services
SERVICE  autoscaling          API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.autoscaling     enabled  
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend   eucalyptus        10.111.5.5                       enabled  
SERVICE  bootstrap            bootstrap         10.111.5.5                       enabled  
SERVICE  cloudformation       API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.cloudformation  enabled  
SERVICE  cloudwatch           API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.cloudwatch      enabled  
SERVICE  cloudwatchbackend    eucalyptus        10.111.5.5                       enabled  
SERVICE  cluster              one               one-cc-0                         enabled  
SERVICE  compute              API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.compute         stopped  
SERVICE  dns                  API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.dns             enabled  
SERVICE  euare                API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.euare           enabled  
SERVICE  eucalyptus           eucalyptus        10.111.5.5                       enabled  
SERVICE  identity             API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.identity        enabled  
SERVICE  imaging              API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.imaging         enabled  
SERVICE  imagingbackend       eucalyptus        10.111.5.5                       stopped  
SERVICE  loadbalancing        API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.loadbalancing   enabled  
SERVICE  notifications        eucalyptus        10.111.5.5                       enabled  
SERVICE  objectstorage        API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.objectstorage   enabled  
SERVICE  pollednotifications  eucalyptus        10.111.5.5                       enabled  
SERVICE  reporting            bootstrap         10.111.5.5                       enabled  
SERVICE  simpleworkflow       API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.simpleworkflow  enabled  
SERVICE  storage              one               one-sc-0                         enabled  
SERVICE  tokens               API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116.tokens          enabled  
SERVICE  user-api             API_10.111.5.116  API_10.111.5.116                 enabled  
SERVICE  walrusbackend        walrus            walrus-0                         enabled  
# 
# 
# euserv-modify-service -s ENABLED arn:euca:eucalyptus::imagingbackend:10.111.5.5/
#
#
{code}

The above puts the system in a state where:

* there is an imaging worker instance that need to be verified
* the compute service is not available to verify the imaging worker instance

Once in this state you will now see warning logging rather than error logging with stack traces:

{code}
Wed Jun 14 10:23:44 2017  WARN [EucalyptusClientTask:eucalyptus-bootstrap-servicecontext-common-worker-689] Failed to lookup ENABLED service of type Compute.
Wed Jun 14 10:23:44 2017  WARN [ImagingBackendService:eucalyptus-bootstrap-servicecontext-common-worker-689] Failed to verify imaging worker. Failed to describe the instances
{code}

This logging occurs when imaging workers periodically check for tasks (or retry a failed request)

Verified. We now throw the following warning log in cloud-debug.log,

{code}
Fri Aug 11 11:11:49 2017  WARN [EucalyptusClientTask:eucalyptus-bootstrap-servicecontext-common-worker-674] Failed to lookup ENABLED service of type Compute.

Fri Aug 11 11:11:49 2017  WARN [EucalyptusClientTask:eucalyptus-bootstrap-servicecontext-common-worker-674] Failed to lookup ENABLED service of type Compute.
Fri Aug 11 11:11:49 2017  WARN [ImagingBackendService:eucalyptus-bootstrap-servicecontext-common-worker-674] Failed to verify imaging worker. Failed to describe the instances
{code}

*Installed Packages*
{code}
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.4.2
Release     : 0.25939.65.20170804git4e99b23.el7
Size        : 243 k
Repo        : installed
{code}
